item.description:
Allan Hughes, DC will be leading this teleseminar.

Each of us has a quiet voice inside us that whispers to us in silence. What is it trying to tell us, and how can we tune into it so we can hear it more clearly?

You don't have to leave your house for this program. Just pick up the phone. The call-in number is: 1712 432 3900. When prompted, enter your access code: 1617505 followed by the # sign.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: The Heart's Cry
